title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 87 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 87 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: His foundation is in the holy mountains.
lineList.cn: （可拉后裔的诗歌）耶和华所立的根基在圣山上。

lineList.en: The LORD loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
lineList.cn: 他爱锡安的门，胜于爱雅各一切的住处。

lineList.en: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.
lineList.cn: 神的城阿，有荣耀的事乃指着你说的。（细拉）

lineList.en: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this man was born there.
lineList.cn: 我要题起拉哈伯，和巴比伦人是在认识我之中的，看哪，非利士，和推罗，并古实人，个个生在那里。

lineList.en: And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.
lineList.cn: 论到锡安必说，这一个那一个都生在其中。而且至高者必亲自坚立这城。

lineList.en: The LORD shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.
lineList.cn: 当耶和华记录万民的时候，他要点出这一个生在那里。（细拉）

lineList.en: As well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there: all my springs are in thee.
lineList.cn: 歌唱的，跳舞的，都要说，我的泉源都在你这里。
